title: Introduction
text:
1 Sign up to Anaconda (do it once)

Go to https://anaconda.cloud
Sign up using your personal or University email address.
Advice: do not use your University password.



2 Log in to Anaconda (do it for each lab)

Login to https://anaconda.cloud
Choose “Notebooks” in the top menu:



Create a folder for all files related to this module:


and name it “MA-M27”.

Open the created folder.
Press blue button with “+”


and choose any of anaconda-notebooks:


Rename the created file


e.g. to “Lab1.ipynb”, “Lab2.ipynb” etc.




 Back to top
